&l;h6 style=\&q;text-align: center;\&q;&g;This page is presented by: Detroit College Access Network&l;/h6&g; &l;/div&g; &l;br class=\&q;clear\&q; /&g; &l;div class=\&q;texte\&q; &g; &l;h3&g;&l;strong&g;&l;span style=\&q;background-color:rgb(255, 221, 88)\&q;&g;PREPARING FOR COLLEGE&l;/span&g;&l;/strong&g;&l;/h3&g; &l;p&g;&l;a href=\&q;https://calendly.com/detroitcan/studentadvising?month=2020-04\&q;&g;Do you need help?&l;/a&g;&l;/p&g; &l;ul&g; &l;li&g;Sign up for a 1 on 1 advising appointment by phone or video.&a;nbsp;&l;a href=\&q;https://calendly.com/detroitcan/studentadvising?month=2020-04\&q;&g;More&l;/a&g;&l;/li&g; &l;/ul&g; &l;p&g;&l;a href=\&q;https://www.detroitcan.org/\&q;&g;Detroit College Access Network&l;/a&g;&l;/p&g; &l;ul&g; &l;li&g;Sign up for DCAN&s;s newsletter to stay informed on college processes. &l;a href=\&q;https://www.detroitcan.org/\&q;&g;More&l;/a&g;&l;/li&g; &l;/ul&g; &l;p&g;&l;a href=\&q;https://drive.google.com/file/d/0Bx1n0vRSytkXLXlrUmZoVEFSVzljRVNDbEprYkY3akNQblBB/view?usp=sharing\&q;&g;Senior College Prep Checklist&l;/a&g;&l;/p&g; &l;ul&g; &l;li&g;Steps seniors must complete to enroll in college or skilled trades after high school. &l;a href=\&q;https://drive.google.com/file/d/0Bx1n0vRSytkXLXlrUmZoVEFSVzljRVNDbEprYkY3akNQblBB/view?usp=sharing\&q;&g;More&a;nbsp;&l;/a&g;&l;/li&g; &l;/ul&g; &l;p&g;&l;a href=\&q;https://studentaid.gov/h/apply-for-aid/fafsa\&q;&g;FAFSA&l;/a&g;&l;a href=\&q;https://drive.google.com/file/d/0Bx1n0vRSytkXLXlrUmZoVEFSVzljRVNDbEprYkY3akNQblBB/view?usp=sharing\&q;&g;​&l;/a&g;&l;/p&g; &l;ul&g; &l;li&g;The federal link to complete your FAFSA. Make sure you have also turned in any verification paperwork your college might be requesting. &l;a href=\&q;https://studentaid.gov/h/apply-for-aid/fafsa\&q;&g;More&l;/a&g;&l;/li&g; &l;/ul&g; &l;p&g;&l;a href=\&q;https://www.detroitchamber.com/profile/\&q;&g;Register for Detroit Promise&l;/a&g;&l;/p&g; &l;ul&g; &l;li&g;The Detroit Promise arranges last dollar funding for eligible students to cover the costs of tuition and mandatory fees. &l;a href=\&q;https://www.detroitchamber.com/profile/\&q;&g;More&l;/a&g;&l;/li&g; &l;/ul&g; &l;p&g;&l;a href=\&q;https://pages.collegeboard.org/collegeboard-covid-19-updates\&q;&g;SAT Updates&l;/a&g;&l;/p&g; &l;ul&g; &l;li&g;The College Board has cancelled all SAT Saturday tests until further notice; even for the June test. &l;a href=\&q;https://pages.collegeboard.org/collegeboard-covid-19-updates\&q;&g;More&l;/a&g;&l;/li&g; &l;/ul&g; &l;p&g;&l;a href=\&q;https://getschooled.com/journey/detroit\&q;&g;Get Schooled - Detroit&l;/a&g;&l;/p&g; &l;ul&g; &l;li&g;We teamed up with the DCAN and the Detroit Mayor’s office to help you on your path to college and finding your first job. &l;a href=\&q;https://getschooled.com/journey/detroit\&q;&g;More&l;/a&g;&l;/li&g; &l;/ul&g; &l;p&g;&l;a href=\&q;https://getschooled.com/journey/get-to-college/help-during-covid-19/choosing-your-college-while-campuses-are-closed\&q;&g;Get Schooled-Picking a college&l;/a&g;&l;/p&g; &l;ul&g; &l;li&g;This volunteer-run community group is distributing water to those in need in the Detroit area. Online map of water stations. More info call 844-429-2837. &l;a href=\&q;https://www.wethepeopleofdetroit.com/get-help\&q;&g;More&l;/a&g;&l;/li&g; &l;/ul&g; &l;p&g;&l;a href=\&q;https://www.deadlinedetroit.com/articles/24671/dte_consumers_limit_energy_shutoffs_during_coronavirus_outbreak\&q;&g;Preventing Power Shutoffs&l;/a&g;&l;/p&g; &l;ul&g; &l;li&g;Consumers Energy and DTE have announced that they will suspend power shutoffs until April for low income and elderly customers. DTE Customers can call (800) 477-4747, Consumers Energy Customers should can find more information here.&a;nbsp; &l;a href=\&q;https://www.deadlinedetroit.com/articles/24671/dte_consumers_limit_energy_shutoffs_during_coronavirus_outbreak\&q;&g;More&l;/a&g;&l;/li&g; &l;/ul&g; &l;p&g;&l;a href=\&q;http://www.waynemetro.org/\&q;&g;Wayne Metro CAA Support&l;/a&g;&l;/p&g; &l;ul&g; &l;li&g;Assistance with Housing, Water and Heat bills, and Taxes. Still supporting virtually through this time! &l;a href=\&q;http://www.waynemetro.org/\&q;&g;More&l;/a&g;&l;/li&g; &l;/ul&g; &l;/div&g; &l;br class=\&q;clear\&q; /&g; &l;div class=\&q;texte\&q; &g; &l;h3&g;&l;strong&g;&l;span style=\&q;background-color:rgb(255, 221, 88)\&q;&g;RESOURCE HIGHLIGHTS&l;/span&g;&l;/strong&g;&l;/h3&g; &l;p&g;&l;a href=\&q;https://detroitmi.gov/news/mayor-duggan-governor-whitmer-and-dwsd-announce-coronavirus-water-restart-plan\&q;&g;Preventing Watershutoffs&l;/a&g;&l;/p&g; &l;ul&g; &l;li&g;Residents without water, or who have received a door hanger indicating that they are at risk of service interruption, will only need to call Wayne Metropolitan Community Action Agency at 313-386-9727 to make an appointment. Once an appointment is made, DWSD will begin the process of restoring service or cancelling a pending service interruption.&a;nbsp; Customers do not have to pay anything at this time. &l;a href=\&q;https://detroitmi.gov/news/mayor-duggan-governor-whitmer-and-dwsd-announce-coronavirus-water-restart-plan\&q;&g;More&l;/a&g;&l;/li&g; &l;ul&g; &l;li&g;The City has eliminated deadlines for Homeowners Property Tax Assistance Program (HPTAP) applications and will now approve them on an on-going basis. &l;a href=\&q;http://detroitmi.gov/pays\&q;&g;More&l;/a&g;&l;/li&g; &l;p&g;&l;a href=\&q;https://www.detroitnews.com/story/news/local/detroit-city/2020/03/16/detroit-court-halts-evictions/5061662002/\&q;&g;No Evictions in 36th District Court&l;/a&g;&l;/p&g; &l;ul&g; &l;li&g;Eviction actions cannot be filed in Court during the coronavirus crisis, eviction actions may be filed once crisis has passed for those who did not pay rent during crisis. &l;a href=\&q;https://www.detroitnews.com/story/news/local/detroit-city/2020/03/16/detroit-court-halts-evictions/5061662002/\&q;&g;More&l;/a&g;&l;/li&g; &l;/ul&g; &l;p&g;&l;a href=\&q;https://www.freep.com/story/opinion/columnists/nancy-kaffer/2020/03/16/wayne-county-tax-foreclosure-auction-canceled-treasurer/5059975002/\&q;&g;No Tax Foreclosures in 2020&l;/a&g;&l;/p&g; &l;ul&g; &l;li&g;Wayne County commits to no foreclosures in 2020 for coronavirus crisis. &l;a href=\&q;https://www.freep.com/story/opinion/columnists/nancy-kaffer/2020/03/16/wayne-county-tax-foreclosure-auction-canceled-treasurer/5059975002/\&q;&g;More&l;/a&g;&l;/li&g; Hotline (24 Hours)&l;/a&g;&l;/p&g; &l;ul&g; &l;li&g;Call the Detroit Health Department for guidance on next steps if you are: 1) A healthcare provider with a possible COVID-19 positive patient, 2) An individual who suspects they have COVID-19&l;/li&g; &l;li&g;&l;a href=\&q;tel:(313) 230-0505\&q;&g;(313) 876-4000&l;/a&g;&l;/li&g; &l;/ul&g; &l;p&g;&l;a href=\&q;tel:(313) 230-0505\&q;&g;Detroit Drive Thru Testing Site&l;/a&g;&l;/p&g; &l;ul&g; &l;li&g;Individuals need a written testing order from their primary care doctor or a prescription, a valid ID AND an appointment to use the drive thru testing center. To make an appointment, call (313) 230-0505 between 9 AM - 7 PM daily. Testing is scheduled to take place from March 27 to May 8.&a;nbsp;&l;/li&g; &l;li&g;&l;a href=\&q;tel:(313) 230-0505\&q;&g;(313) 230-0505&l;/a&g;&l;/li&g; &l;/ul&g; &l;p&g;&l;a href=\&q;tel:(734) 287-7870\&q;&g;Wayne CO Health Hotline&a;nbsp;&l;/a&g;&l;/p&g; &l;div class=\&q;texte\&q; &g; &l;h6 style=\&q;text-align: center;\&q;&g;This page is presented by: Black Mental Health Association&l;/h6&g; &l;/div&g; &l;br class=\&q;clear\&q; /&g; &l;div class=\&q;texte\&q; &g; &l;h3&g;&l;strong&g;&l;span style=\&q;background-color:rgb(255, 221, 88)\&q;&g;HELPFUL CONNECTIONS&l;/span&g;&l;/strong&g;&l;/h3&g; &l;p&g;&l;a href=\&q;https://pluginserver.buildfire.com/plugins/14f91903-1cf0-4cec-a76d-3f7e25ebe751/control/content/%22https://www.crisistextline.org/get-help/coronavirus%20%22\&q;&g;Crisis Text Line&l;/a&g;&l;/p&g; &l;ul&g; &l;li&g;Anxious about Coronavirus?&a;nbsp; Text HOME to 741741 to connect with a crisis counselor. Text from anywhere in the USA to text with a trained Crisis Counselor. Every texter is connected with a Crisis Counselor, a real-life human being trained to bring texters from a hot moment to a cool calm through active listening and collaborative problem solving. All of Crisis Text Line&s;s Crisis Counselors are volunteers, donating their time to helping people in crisis. &l;a href=\&q;https://pluginserver.buildfire.com/plugins/14f91903-1cf0-4cec-a76d-3f7e25ebe751/control/content/%22https://www.crisistextline.org/get-help/coronavirus%20%22\&q;&g;More&l;/a&g;&l;/li&g; &l;/ul&g; &l;p&g;&l;a href=\&q;https://dwihn.org/\&q;&g;Detroit Wayne Integrated Health Network&l;/a&g;&l;/p&g; &l;ul&g; &l;li&g;A healthcare safety net organization that provides access to a full array of integrated services that facilitate individuals to maximize their level of function and create opportunities for quality of life. &l;a href=\&q;https://dwihn.org/\&q;&g;More&l;/a&g;&l;/li&g; &l;/ul&g; &l;p&g;&l;a href=\&q;https://detroitmi.gov/sites/detroitmi.localhost/files/2020-04/FamilyResources.pdf\&q;&g;List of Crisis Resources&l;/a&g;&l;/p&g; &l;ul&g; &l;li&g;List of resources for families and children in crisis, including resources for teens and homeless youth. &l;a href=\&q;https://detroitmi.gov/sites/detroitmi.localhost/files/2020-04/FamilyResources.pdf\&q;&g;More&l;/a&g;&l;/li&g; &l;/ul&g; &l;p&g;&l;a href=\&q;tel:1-800-985-5990\&q;&g;SAMHSA&l;/a&g;&l;/p&g; &l;ul&g; &l;li&g;SAMHSA (Substance Abuse and Mental Health Services Administration), Disaster Distress Helpline&a;nbsp;&l;/li&g; &l;li&g;24/7 Help line focused on crisis counseling, multilingual confidential crisis support line 1-800-985-5990&l;/li&g; &l;li&g;Or, text “TalkWithUs” to 66746&l;/li&g; &l;li&g;&l;a href=\&q;tel:1-800-985-5990\&q;&g;(313) 833 – 2500&l;/a&g;, M-F from 8:00 AM – 4:30 PM&l;/li&g; &l;/ul&g; &l;p&g;&l;a href=\&q;tel:313-841-7474\&q;&g;Southwest Solutions&l;/a&g;&l;/p&g; &l;ul&g; &l;li&g;Southwest Solutions has moved to telehealth and offers services for children, youth, adults and families. &l;a href=\&q;tel:313-841-7474\&q;&g;More&l;/a&g;&l;/li&g; &l;/ul&g; &l;p&g;&l;a href=\&q;https://www.nami.org/About-NAMI/NAMI-News/2020/NAMI-Updates-on-the-Coronavirus\&q;&g;Find Support - NAMI&l;/a&g;&l;/p&g; &l;ul&g; &l;li&g;If you or someone you know is struggling, you are not alone. There are many supports, services and treatment options that may help. A change in behavior or mood may be the early warning signs of a mental health condition and should never be ignored. &l;a href=\&q;https://www.nami.org/About-NAMI/NAMI-News/2020/NAMI-Updates-on-the-Coronavirus\&q;&g;More&l;/a&g;&l;/li&g; &l;/ul&g; &l;p&g;&l;a href=\&q;https://www.wellplace.com/\&q;&g;Wellplace
